Posts.Content: That was me yesterday, went in for the results from sterio-biopsy. Calcifications was benign but tissue around it was abnormal, called atypical lobular hyperplasia, now gotta see surgeon to have it removed nervous wreck
Posts.Title: Calcifications and biopsies.....

Posts.Content: I had a stereotactic core biopsy last wed. Got results back yesterday, it was for a Calcification they found on my mammogram, the calcification is benign, but the tissue around is abnormal. They want me to see a surgeon to have more tissue removed. Anyone have this done? Im stressing out like crazy :(
Posts.Title: Atypical Lobular Hyperplasia (ALH)
